name: MovieExpert
0:
”Alexa, ask movie expert about the movie Gone With The Wind”
”Alexa, ask movie expert for information about the movie The Wizard of Oz”
”Alexa, ask movie expert to tell me about the movie Citizen Kane”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie expert
des:
Forgotten all about your favorite movies? Need to beat your friends in a trivia quiz? Well struggle no more as Alexa is here to give you all the information you need!

Ask Alexa about your favorite movies and she will read out when it was released, the names of the director, cast information and the plot.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
